parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Math - Geometry

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Computes the [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Euclidean_distance#Squared_Euclidean_distance squared distance] between two objects or positions.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> var1 '''distanceSqr''' var2

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> var1: [[Object]] or [[Position]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> var2: [[Object]] or [[Position]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] Distance in meters or 1e10 if distance cannot be calculated

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[distanceSqr]] ([[leader]] [[player]])</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_distance = [[sqrt]] ((x2 - x1) ^ 2 + (y2 - y1) ^ 2 + (z2 - z1) ^ 2);
_distanceSqr = (x2 - x1) ^ 2 + (y2 - y1) ^ 2 + (z2 - z1) ^ 2;
_distance = [x1, y1, z1] [[distance]] [x2, y2, z2];
_distanceSqr = [x1, y1, z1] [[distanceSqr]] [x2, y2, z2];
_distance = [[sqrt]] ([x1, y1, z1] [[distanceSqr]] [x2, y2, z2]);
_distanceSqr = ([x1, y1, z1] [[distance]] [x2, y2, z2]) ^ 2;</code>

If normal distance is calculated according to this formula:


squared distance is calculated according to this formula:  

[[distanceSqr]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> 

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[distance]], [[vectorDistanceSqr]], [[distance2D]]
</value></part></template></root>
